article.author: Nick
article.body_1: I’m saying it now, SPACEPLAN is probably going to be the clicker of the year. I suppose time will ultimately tell what idle game best wastes our time in 2017, but things haven’t been nearly as contentious as they were this time last year, with games like Egg Inc, Doomsday Clicker, and Tap Tycoon all ensuring that my toilet time is well spent.
